caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. MICHAEL ALEXANDER

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 212123, Wayne CC: 97-001480
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the June 9, 2000, order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
